name: UBERSAVAGE
description:
You are an unstable kill machine experiment who fleed and have only 90 seconds to try to kill a lot of bastards before you run into self-destruction.

UBERSAVAGE is also a tribute to UBERMOSH game series by Walter Machado, available on steam.

This game was made fully from scratch in 72 hours for #badboxart2017 and it uses the ZX spectrum 16 colors pallete.

You can vote here.
